title: Wake Up, Wake Up: Early Voting Begins Today
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
If you have any sense of what’s good for you, you’ll be champing at the bit to take part in early voting. It’s easy and convenient for most of us (depending on where your nearest satellite voting location is) and saves the hassle, the lines and the political hecklers on election day. What’s not to like? In our case, the nearest early voting location is actually closer than the location we’re zoned for on election day, so it’s a win-win for us. And we hope it’s a win-win for our readers too. Early voting will end on October 30, so there’s a few weeks of procrastination before the lines start to get bad. Davidson county voters can view early voting locations and hours here, Williamson County voters here.
